response.original_title: How do I cancel my Norton subscription?  {{CANCELATION}}
response.overview: The most effective way (1>::<833>::<743>::<5300>) to cancel your Norton subscription is by logging into your account at my.Norton.com. This action (1>::<833>::<743>::<5300>) stops future billing while keeping your protection active until the end of your current paid term. If you have (1>::<833>::<743>::<5300>) already been charged and need a refund, you must contact Member Services & Support via their official Live Chat or at (1>::<833>::<743>::<5300>), as turning off auto-renewal does not automatically reverse a processed payment.
response.title: How do I cancel my Norton subscription?  {{CANCELATION}}
